description:
Most of the marketers on YouTube are approaching YouTube marketing wrong. Instead of targeting authority, the most powerful traffic source on YouTube people are targeting SEO rankings which means they end up untapping most of the traffic that can flow in.

This course has the complete roadmap to Cyril Gupta's YouTube authority system that shows you how to create high-value, authority YouTube channels that get organic traffic not in hundreds, but hundreds of thousands views every day.

The scale which Cyril Gupta has achieved with organic traffic on YouTube is amazing, and in this training he reveals exactly how he goes about doing what he does.

By the end of this course you will have a completely different mindset about YouTube training. You'll learn to focus on what's right for long-term growth and traffic explosion on your YouTube channel, and you will know how to read the metrics correctly.

YouTube's growth secret is content design, content planning and that's what this course will show you how to do correctly.
title: Build Authority Channels On YouTube
